subject: Baseball
Steroids
Tests (Drug Use)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Dustin Richardson, a former Boston Red Sox reliever, was suspended this week for 50 games after a random drug test came up positive for performance-enhancing drugs.
snippet: Dustin Richardson, a former Boston Red Sox reliever, was suspended this week for 50 games after a random drug test came up positive for performance-enhancing drugs.
